医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的肾癌模型强调了驱动转移的分子靶标和基因组事件德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的研究人员设计了一种新的侵袭性肾细胞癌 (RCC) 模型，强调了触发染色体不稳定和驱动转移进展的分子靶点和基因组事件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/New-kidney-cancer-model-highlights-molecular-targets-and-genomic-events-that-drive-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/New-kidney-cancer-model-highlights-molecular-targets-and-genomic-events-that-drive-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd5473d0-286a-4c56-adb9-2f78390407b9 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 21:01:17 -0400 New kidney cancer model highlights molecular targets and genomic events that drive metastasis
个性化剂量可改善转移性去势抵抗性前列腺癌男性的预后通过监测接受 177Lu-PSMA 前列腺癌治疗的男性的早期反应生物标志物，医生可以个性化给药间隔，从而显着改善患者的治疗效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Personalized-dosing-improves-outcomes-for-men-with-metastatic-castration-pressive-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Personalized-dosing-improves-outcomes-for-men-with-metastatic-castration-pressive-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de4e0ac5-25e7-48cc-b7b9-9cf845eb8a58 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 20:55:22 -0400 Personalized dosing improves outcomes for men with metastatic castration-resistant prostate cancer
新的计算技术有望识别阿尔茨海默病的不同亚型一种新的计算技术结合了基因组和 tau PET 成像数据，有望为阿尔茨海默病的亚型分型提供更加个性化的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/New-computational-technique-shows-promise-for-identifying- Different-subtypes-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/New-computational-technique-shows-promise-for-identifying- Different-subtypes-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89199aa2-e7c3-4855-bef0-b69f71f5a065 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 20:52:49 -0400 New computational technique shows promise for identifying different subtypes of Alzheimer's disease
研究人员查明了导致结肠癌侵袭性扩散的一个关键特征在对抗致命癌症的斗争中取得了重大进展，奥塔哥大学的研究人员查明了导致结肠癌侵袭性扩散的一个关键特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Researchers-pinpoint-a-key-feature-that-leads-to-aggressive-spread-of-colon-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Researchers-pinpoint-a-key-feature-that-leads-to-aggressive-spread-of-colon-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec5f094f-a5c8-4cbe-844f-b3e43bd18cf9 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 20:46:10 -0400 Researchers pinpoint a key feature that leads to aggressive spread of colon cancer
去脂体重和年龄可以预测女性戒酒的速度科学家在一项新研究中发现，女性从血液中消除酒精的速度很大程度上取决于她们的去脂体重，尽管年龄也发挥着一定作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Lean-body-mass-and-age-predict-how-quickly-women-eliminate-alcohol.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Lean-body-mass-and-age-predict-how-quickly-women-eliminate-alcohol.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46487fcf-1732-45f1-9cba-cf507be6eeb1 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 20:43:31 -0400 Lean body mass and age predict how quickly women eliminate alcohol
世界著名研究人员因其对临床精神药理学的贡献而荣获最高奖丹尼斯·查尼 (Dennis Charney) 医学博士、西奈山伊坎医学院安妮和乔尔·埃伦克兰兹 (Anne and Joel Ehrenkranz) 院长兼西奈山卫生系统学术事务主席荣获美国临床精神药理学会 (ASCP) 颁发的享有盛誉的唐纳德·克莱因终身成就奖）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/World-renowned-researcher-receives-top-award-for-contributions-to-clinical-psychopharmacology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/World-renowned-researcher-receives-top-award-for-contributions-to-clinical-psychopharmacology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=acf14498-3c64-416e-9166-e29a40f9a6e3 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 20:39:21 -0400 World-renowned researcher receives top award for contributions to clinical psychopharmacology
卡尔加里大学研究人员发现利什曼原虫寄生虫如何隐藏在体内卡尔加里大学的研究人员发现了利什曼原虫寄生虫如何隐藏在体内导致利什曼病。这种微小的寄生虫是由受感染的白蛉携带的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/UCalgary-researchers-discover-how-Leishmania-parasites-hide-within-the-body.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/UCalgary-researchers-discover-how-Leishmania-parasites-hide-within-the-body.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98d66c6c-c79f-4bd5-8042-3636791afd73 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 20:33:55 -0400 UCalgary researchers discover how Leishmania parasites hide within the body
高剂量口服索马鲁肽可有效降低血糖和促进减肥糖尿病是一种进行性疾病，会影响一个人控制血糖水平的能力。对于许多患者来说，随着时间的推移，病情会变得更加严重，血糖水平也变得更加难以控制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Higher-doses-of-oral-semaglutide- effective-in-lowering-blood-sugar-and-promoting-weight-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Higher-doses-of-oral-semaglutide- effective-in-lowering-blood-sugar-and-promoting-weight-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e51980f-7985-4311-8cad-cff1bd66d71b Mon, 26 Jun 2023 20:28:41 -0400 Higher doses of oral semaglutide effective in lowering blood sugar and promoting weight loss
研究人员发现了一种治疗 NASH 相关纤维化的潜在新药加州大学圣地亚哥分校医学院的研究人员领导了一项研究，旨在探讨一种针对非酒精性脂肪性肝炎 (NASH) 相关纤维化患者的潜在新治疗方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Researchers-identify-a-pottial-new-drug-for-NASH-lated-fibrosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Researchers-identify-a-pottial-new-drug-for-NASH-lated-太多纤维化.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13fd32d7-d435-46a6-8aef-b9cab3a6a719 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 20:25:33 -0400 Researchers identify a potential new drug for NASH-related fibrosis
智能袖带：测量多种心脏功能的单一设备手术和重症监护患者面临更高的死亡风险和更长的住院时间，因为他们容易出现低血压和血流动力学不稳定（或血流不稳定）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Smart-Cuff-A-single-device-to-measure-multiple-cardiac-functions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Smart-Cuff-A-single-device-to-measure-multiple-cardiac-functions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56de48b1-51d8-4f69-bc21-b35743ebc5de Mon, 26 Jun 2023 20:23:12 -0400 Smart Cuff: A single device to measure multiple cardiac functions
